title: Nasus bot
body: Can Nasus ADC by having a sustain support heal/shield him whenever so he'll never leave lane and farm a LOT? Why is he top?

replies.body: Ranged means poke, Poke means your going to hurt, especially early.
kinda wanna add her that if your healing a lot early means less mana later - More backing early - less XP - less stacks - less lane pushing - less wins.

Well when we(meaning my friends 'we') see a Nasus top lane we tell our top laner(who normally isn't our friend but our ally so we respect him/her) if we can take over top while he plays passively in bot trying not to give kills, so Nasus can't stack Nasus not stacking equals weak Nasus weak Nasus means he has low gold and damage which also means Nasus can't bully our ADC and he is shut down from start so its basically a 5v4.

Normally after 10 minutes of Nasus getting like 30 stacks(10 kills with q) we go mid secure a kill then push bot get more kills then hit dragon or tower depending how it goes bot.

P.S. to answer your question "Why is he top?" he is top so his sup can't take his XP when near his kills lower level Nasus weaker q can't stack properly cause enemy poking him dealing 300 damage each q he tries and he can't stack with W
you play him bot and see what happens

It sorta works however if he does play with a support top or bot you're leaving vulnerabilities in other lanes and having 80-200 on your Q isn't always going to be good when the enemy has a farmed ADC doing 600 damage autos 50% of the time and if you do play him bot they're basically going to get that farm anyway.
